entry.title: Castle-Combat is playable again
entry.content:
Roughly 13 years after the last release, Castle-Combat got a refresh that brings it into a playable state on modern machines, again. The code has been ported to python3 and recent numpy versions, so that you can run it without the need to install outdated dependencies. There's also bug fixes and game play improvements that were previously unreleased.

Get it on https://github.com/karlb/castle-combat!

entry.title: Nuclear Chess playable in your browser and on Android
entry.content:
Nuclear Chess has been ported to JavaScript, so that you can play right from your browser. I've also packaged it as an Android App available on Google Play. Try it and let me know what you think!

And if there's something you want to improve, feel free to dive into the code on github.
